column1: This is a project i made to practice what i have learned
A python course by Angela Yu
This project is a fantasy name generator
where the user first makes some choices (sex of character) and then

column2: the user might choose to add a title or place-name.

column1: ALl names are generated by using Chat gpt
column2: and does include names that are trademarked.

column1: You should therefore not use this generator for anything other than private use.
